function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The potential spread of contagious diseases through touch-based interfaces and remote human interaction technologies","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Regular sanitization of touch-based interfaces, implementation of touchless technology, and promotion of remote interaction","Technologies":"Touchless interfaces, remote interaction technology, contactless payment systems","People":"Consumers, retail employees, and individuals in remote human interaction scenarios","Owner":"Online retailers, technology companies, and public health authorities"}]}
